item.title: Projects
item.description: Some of the things I’ve built: Name What it does Netmon network monitoring tool built using Go Tg simple CLI password manager built in Go RepoGen Let’s you create repos on github from the terminal PyNet Send files over the networj using python. (this was more of a proof of concept) Gno A custom build system built in go. Heavily inspired by nobuild just not as good Sik A sort of local search engine for markdown files

item.title: About
item.description: I am a software engineer interested in a range of topics including CLIs, developer tools, recently taken a liking to mobile development. Resume
